messages.subject: Samurai Fiction contest 2006
messages.msgSnippet: We are currently working on the details of the next annual Samurai Fiction contest. I ll be posting some polls here today to get some input, so I d appreciate
messages.messageBody:
We are currently working on the details of the next annual Samurai
Fiction contest. I'll be posting some polls here today to get some
input, so I'd appreciate it if as many people would answer as possible.

Thanks,

Kitsuno
Moderator
